comments.author: iSean
comments.body: I lack a bicycling device today, but I'd be up for a jolly stroll if anyone is interested...

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Hey Sean, Steve generally has spare wheels (with _gears!_). See if you can check a ride out for the noon hour.

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: What are these "gears" that you speak of? Sounds fancy. Unless people also want to donate some clothing, I think I'll have to walk this one off -- I've been leaving everything at home until it's warmer in the mornings (so I can ride in).

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: Unfortunately, it's poisonous gumbo. Good for keeping the mosquitoes away...
